trans-unit.source: Represents a serial port resource.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en seriellport ressurs.

trans-unit.source: Use this class to control a serial port file resource.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne klassen for å kontrollere seriellport-filressurs.

trans-unit.source: This class provides synchronous and event-driven I/O, access to pin and break states, and access to serial driver properties.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen gir synkrone og hendelsen datadrevne i/u-tilgang til PIN-kode og break tilstander og tilgang til seriell driveregenskaper.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the functionality of this class can be wrapped in an internal <xref:System.IO.Stream> object, accessible through the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> property, and passed to classes that wrap or use streams.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg funksjonaliteten til denne klassen kan være omsluttet av en intern <xref:System.IO.Stream>objektet tilgjengelig gjennom den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A>egenskapen og sendt til klasser som bryte, eller bruk flyter.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BaseStream%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The SerialPort class supports the following encodings: <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>, <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding>, and any encoding defined in mscorlib.dll where the code page is less than 50000 or the code page is 54936.
trans-unit.target: Klassen SerialPort støtter følgende koder: <xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding>, <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>, <xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding>, og koding definert i mscorlib.dll der tegntabellen er mindre enn 50000 eller tegntabellen 54936.</xref:System.Text.UTF32Encoding> </xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> </xref:System.Text.UTF8Encoding> </xref:System.Text.ASCIIEncoding>

trans-unit.source: You can use alternate encodings, but you must use the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Write%2A> method and perform the encoding yourself.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke alternative koding, men du må bruke den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A>eller <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Write%2A>metoden og utføre kodingen selv.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Write%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadByte%2A>

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A> method to retrieve the valid ports for the current computer.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A>metode for å hente portene som er ugyldig for den gjeldende datamaskinen.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.GetPortNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a SerialPort object becomes blocked during a read operation, do not abort the thread.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et SerialPort objekt blir blokkert under en leseoperasjon, ikke avbryte tråden.

trans-unit.source: Instead, either close the base stream or dispose of the SerialPort object.
trans-unit.target: I stedet å lukke grunntallet flyten eller fjerne SerialPort-objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <xref:System.IO.Stream> object for a <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter den underliggende <xref:System.IO.Stream>objekt en <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"> </xref> objektet.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Use this property for explicit asynchronous I/O operations or to pass the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object to a <xref:System.IO.Stream> wrapper class such as <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen for eksplisitte asynkrone i/u-operasjoner eller til å sende <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>objekt til en <xref:System.IO.Stream>wrapper klassen som <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>.</xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: Any open serial port's BaseStream property returns an object that derives from the abstract <xref:System.IO.Stream> class, and implements read and write methods using the prototypes inherited from the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class: <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadByte%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Åpne et objekt som er avledet fra abstract seriell port BaseStream returnerer <xref:System.IO.Stream>klassen, og implementerer lese og skrive til metoder ved hjelp av prototyper arvet fra den <xref:System.IO.Stream>klasse: <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadByte%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>, og <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadByte%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: These methods can be useful when passing a wrapped serial resource to a <xref:System.IO.Stream> wrapper class.
trans-unit.target: Disse metodene kan være nyttig ved sending av en innpakket seriell ressurs til <xref:System.IO.Stream>wrapper klasse.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Due to the inaccessibility of the wrapped file handle, the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A> properties are not supported, and the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Seek%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Stream.SetLength%2A> methods are not supported.
trans-unit.target: På grunn av inaccessibility av innpakket filreferansen den <xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A>og <xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A>Egenskaper støttes ikke, og <xref:System.IO.Stream.Seek%2A>og <xref:System.IO.Stream.SetLength%2A>metoder støttes ikke.</xref:System.IO.Stream.SetLength%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Seek%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Position%2A> </xref:System.IO.Stream.Length%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.IO.Stream>objektet.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: This can occur because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open*> method has not been called or the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close*> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje fordi det <> </> *> har ikke blitt kalt eller <> </> *> har blitt kalt.

trans-unit.source: The stream is in a .NET Compact Framework application and one of the following methods was called: <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead*> <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite*> <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead*> <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite*> The .NET Compact Framework does not support the asynchronous model with base streams.
trans-unit.target: Det er i et .NET Compact Framework-program og ett av følgende metoder ble kalt: <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *> <> </> *> i .NET Compact Framework støtter ikke asynkron modellen med grunntallet dataflyter.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the serial baud rate.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den serielle overføringshastigheten.

trans-unit.source: The baud rate must be supported by the user's serial driver.
trans-unit.target: Overføringshastigheten må støttes av brukerens seriell driver.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 9600 bits per second (bps).
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 9 600 biter per sekund (byte /).

trans-unit.source: The baud rate.
trans-unit.target: Overføringshastighet.

trans-unit.source: The baud rate specified is less than or equal to zero, or is greater than the maximum allowable baud rate for the device.
trans-unit.target: Angitt overføringshastighet er mindre enn eller lik null, eller er større enn den maksimale tillatte overføringshastigheten for enheten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the break signal state.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir break signal tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The break signal state occurs when a transmission is suspended and the line is placed in a break state (all low, no stop bit) until released.
trans-unit.target: Tilstanden break signal oppstår når en overføring er utsatt og linjen er plassert i en break-tilstand (alle lav, ingen stop-biters) til frigitt.

trans-unit.source: To enter a break state, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en break-tilstand, må du angi denne egenskapen `true`.

trans-unit.source: If the port is already in a break state, setting this property again to `true` does not result in an exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis porten er allerede i en break-tilstand, når egenskapen settes til på nytt `true` ikke føre til et unntak.

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to write to the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object while BreakState is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke mulig å skrive til den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>objekt under BreakState `true`.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the port is in a break state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis porten er i en break-tilstanden. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: This can occur because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open*> method has not been called or the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close*> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje fordi det <> </> *> har ikke blitt kalt eller <> </> *> har blitt kalt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes of data in the receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall byte med data i mottaksbufferen.

trans-unit.source: The receive buffer includes the serial driver's receive buffer as well as internal buffering in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object itself.
trans-unit.target: Mottaksbufferen inkluderer den serielle driveren mottaksbufferen samt intern bufring i den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>selve objektet.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: Because the BytesToRead property represents both the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> buffer and the Windows-created buffer, it can return a greater value than the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A> property, which represents only the Windows-created buffer.
trans-unit.target: Fordi egenskapen BytesToRead representerer både den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>bufferen og bufferen som opprettes av Windows, kan det returnere en høyere verdi enn den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A>egenskapen som representerer bare Windows-opprettet bufferen.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReadBufferSize%2A> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of data in the receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte i mottaksbufferen.

trans-unit.source: The port is not open.
trans-unit.target: Porten er ikke åpen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes of data in the send buffer.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall byte med data i sendebufferen.

trans-unit.source: The send buffer includes the serial driver's send buffer as well as internal buffering in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object itself.
trans-unit.target: Sendebufferen inkluderer den serielle driveren sendebufferen samt intern bufring i den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>selve objektet.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes of data in the send buffer.
trans-unit.target: Antall byte i sendebufferen.

trans-unit.source: The port is in an invalid state.
trans-unit.target: Porten er en ugyldig tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: This can occur because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open*> method has not been called or the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close*> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje fordi det <> </> *> har ikke blitt kalt eller <> </> *> har blitt kalt.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the Carrier Detect line for the port.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for linjen operatør oppdage for porten.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to monitor the state of the carrier detection line for a port.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes til å overvåke tilstanden til operatør gjenkjenning linjen for en port.

trans-unit.source: No carrier usually indicates that the receiver has hung up and the carrier has been dropped.
trans-unit.target: Ingen leverandør angir vanligvis at mottakeren har hengt seg og blitt slettet av leverandøren.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the carrier is detected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis operatør oppdages; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: This can occur because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open*> method has not been called or the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close*> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje fordi det <> </> *> har ikke blitt kalt eller <> </> *> har blitt kalt.

trans-unit.source: Closes the port connection, sets the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.IsOpen*> property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, and disposes of the internal <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: Lukker porttilkoblingen, angir du <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.IsOpen*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, og disposes for den interne <xref:System.IO.Stream>objektet.</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method closes the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object and clears both the receive and transmit buffers.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden lukker den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>objekt fjerner både mottaket og overføre buffere.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose?displayProperty=fullName> method, which invokes the protected <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kaller den <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose?displayProperty=fullName>metode, som aktiverer den beskyttede <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName>metoden med den `disposing` parameteren satt til `true`.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Dispose%28System.Boolean%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The best practice for any application is to wait for some amount of time after calling the Close method before attempting to call the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open%2A> method, as the port may not be closed instantly.
trans-unit.target: Det er best for alle programmer er å vente på noen tidsperiode etter kaller Close-metoden før du prøver å kalle den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open%2A>metoden porten kan ikke lukkes umiddelbart.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the Clear-to-Send line.
trans-unit.target: Får statusen for Fjern-Send linjen.

trans-unit.source: The Clear-to-Send (CTS) line is used in Request to Send/Clear to Send (RTS/CTS) hardware handshaking.
trans-unit.target: Fjern du vil sende (CTS) linjen er brukt i forespørselen om å sende/Nullstill sende (RTS/CTS) maskinvare-håndtrykk.

trans-unit.source: The CTS line is queried by a port before data is sent.
trans-unit.target: CTS linjen forespørres av en port før data sendes.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Clear-to-Send line is detected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis Fjern-Send linjen oppdages; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: This can occur because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open*> method has not been called or the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close*> method has been called.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje fordi det <> </> *> har ikke blitt kalt eller <> </> *> har blitt kalt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the standard length of data bits per byte.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir standard lang databiter per byte.

trans-unit.source: The range of values for this property is from 5 through 8.
trans-unit.target: Verdiområdet for denne egenskapen er fra 5 til 8.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 8.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 8.

trans-unit.source: The data bits length.
trans-unit.target: Datalengden biter.

trans-unit.source: The data bits value is less than 5 or more than 8.
trans-unit.target: Bits dataverdien er mindre enn 5 eller mer enn 8.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that data has been received through a port represented by the <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Indikerer at data er mottatt via en port som representeres av den <xref href="System.IO.Ports.SerialPort"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Data events can be caused by any of the items in the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialData> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Datahendelser kan skyldes ett av elementene i den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialData>opplisting.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialData>

trans-unit.source: Because the operating system determines whether to raise this event or not, not all parity errors may be reported.
trans-unit.target: Fordi operativsystemet bestemmer om opphøye denne hendelsen eller ikke, kanskje ikke alle paritetsfeil rapporteres.

trans-unit.source: The DataReceived event is also raised if an Eof character is received, regardless of the number of bytes in the internal input buffer and the value of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReceivedBytesThreshold%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: DataReceived denne hendelsen oppstår også hvis det Eof-tegnet mottas, uansett hvor mange byte intern inndatabufferen og verdien for den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReceivedBytesThreshold%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ReceivedBytesThreshold%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged>, DataReceived, and <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived> events may be called out of order, and there may be a slight delay between when the underlying stream reports the error and when the event handler is executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged>, DataReceived, og <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived>hendelser kan kalles utenfor gyldig område, og det kan være en liten forsinkelse mellom når underliggende dataflyt rapporteres feil og når hendelsesbehandlingen er utført.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.ErrorReceived></xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.PinChanged>

trans-unit.source: Only one event handler can execute at a time.
trans-unit.target: Bare én hendelsesbehandling kan kjøres samtidig.

trans-unit.source: The DataReceived event is not guaranteed to be raised for every byte received.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen DataReceived garanteres ikke til å være hevet for hver byte mottatt.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A> property to determine how much data is left to be read in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>til å fastslå hvor mye data som gjenstår for å lese i bufferen.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.BytesToRead%2A>

trans-unit.source: The DataReceived event is raised on a secondary thread when data is received from the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> object.
trans-unit.target: DataReceived denne hendelsen oppstår i en sekundær tråd når data mottas fra den <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>objektet.</xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort>

trans-unit.source: Because this event is raised on a secondary thread, and not the main thread, attempting to modify some elements in the main thread, such as UI elements, could raise a threading exception.
trans-unit.target: Fordi denne hendelsen oppstår på en sekundær tråd og ikke hovedtråden, prøver å endre enkelte elementer i hovedtråden, for eksempel UI-elementene kan vise en trådmodell unntak.

trans-unit.source: If it is necessary to modify elements in the main <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, post change requests back using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, which will do the work on the proper thread.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er nødvendig for å endre elementer i hovedvinduet <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, post endringsforespørsler igjen ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A>, som vil arbeidet på riktig tråden.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Invoke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, tilsvarer følgende Visual Basic-kode: `MSComm1.InBufferCount = 0`.

trans-unit.source: It clears the receive buffer, but does not affect the transmit buffer.
trans-unit.target: Den fjernes mottaksbufferen, men påvirker ikke sender-bufferen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether null bytes are ignored when transmitted between the port and the receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om null byte ignoreres når mellom porten og mottaksbufferen.

trans-unit.source: This value should normally be set to `false`, especially for binary transmissions.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien vanligvis må være satt til `false`, spesielt for binære overføringer.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` can cause unexpected results for UTF32- and UTF16-encoded bytes.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen settes `true` kan føre til uventede resultater for UTF32 - og UTF16-kodet byte.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if null bytes are ignored; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.

trans-unit.target: Denne metoden, tilsvarer følgende Visual Basic-kode: `MSComm1.OutBufferCount = 0`.

trans-unit.source: It clears the transmit buffer, but does not affect the receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: Den fjernes sender bufferen, men påvirker ikke mottaksbufferen.

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: This can occur because the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Open*> method has not been called or the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.Close*> method has been called.
